Localization.Name: Aopoa
Localization.Description: Though many attributed their elevation to the sole provider of light craft to audacity and daring, Aopoa cemented their position thanks to the innovative dual-vector thruster technology that has revolutionized their ship design.

English.Name: Aopoa
English.Description: Though many attributed their elevation to the sole provider of light craft to audacity and daring, Aopoa cemented their position thanks to the innovative dual-vector thruster technology that has revolutionized their ship design.
